name: WORLD-END-HEART-GIRL
description:
WORLD END HEART GIRL

made for NANORENO 2023

After a certain mission, a bunch of Songstress' Songbird Angels were given their own HEART WORLDS to look after as a prize..... with loads of awesomefun humans in them...... wow....

WITH

- 2 endings collect them all wow
- all music and art and characters ETC made by CHARLIE (what hte heck.)
- awesome characters both angel and human wtf
- its AWESOME

CONTROLS Windows

- PROCEED: Z / ENTER / left-click
- MENU: X / ESC / right-click
- FAST-FORWARD: pg dn (page down)
- OPEN TEXT HISTORY LOG: ctrl

MAC

- PROCEED: left-click
- MENU: right-click
- history and fast-forward seemingly not available for mac... sowwyy
